api_list.name: Get Latest Article List
api_list.description: Return a list of current latest news article with info.

api_list.name: Get Article by SID
api_list.description: Return news article content based on sid stated in **Get Latest Article List** method.

required_parameters.name: sid
required_parameters.description: Article id number return by **Get Latest Article List** method (stated as **sid**)

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://malaysia-kini.p.rapidapi.com/get_article/565154"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "malaysia-kini.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://malaysia-kini.p.rapidapi.com/get_article/{sid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "malaysia-kini.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
